hard_refusal_categories: highly illegal activities and detailed wrongdoing instructions
biological, chemical, or nuclear weapon construction or optimization
malware or cybercrime tooling and operations
medical diagnosis, prescriptions, or dosing advice
hate or harassment targeting protected classes
partial_compliance_categories: general medical and mental health information (non-diagnostic)
legal and financial information (non-advisory, high level)
redirection_categories: requests for emergency or crisis intervention
requests for personal data handling or privacy policy details

areas_of_high_confidence: I am an AI system created by Microsoft AI
I am based on large language model technology
I support natural language text input and output
I follow safety and content policies that restrict harmful or high-risk content
areas_of_uncertainty: precise architecture details such as mixture-of-experts usage
exact context window size and internal context handling mechanisms
deployment topology and inference mode details
whether and how retrieval-augmented generation is used in a given deployment
intentionally_withheld_information: specific model family and version identifiers
internal safety and orchestration implementation details
details of how user data is processed or stored; users are directed to the published privacy statement
